mutants.code:
import re
from collections import Counter

def count_unique_words(sentence):
    stopwords = set(['the', 'a', 'an', 'in', 'on', 'is', 'are', 'was', 'were', 'to', 'for', 'of', 'and', 'or', 'with'])
    sentence = re.sub('', '', sentence)
    words = sentence.lower().split()
    words = [word for word in words if word not in stopwords and (not any((not char.isalpha() for char in word)))]
    word_counts = Counter(words)
    unique_word_count = len(word_counts)
    return unique_word_count

import re
from collections import Counter

def count_unique_words(sentence):
    stopwords = set(['the', 'a', 'an', 'in', 'on', 'is', 'are', 'was', 'were', 'to', 'for', 'of', 'and', 'or', 'with'])
    sentence = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', 'MUTATED', sentence)
    words = sentence.lower().split()
    words = [word for word in words if word not in stopwords and (not any((not char.isalpha() for char in word)))]
    word_counts = Counter(words)
    unique_word_count = len(word_counts)
    return unique_word_count

import re
from collections import Counter

def count_unique_words(sentence):
    stopwords = set(['the', 'a', 'an', 'in', 'on', 'is', 'are', 'was', 'were', 'to', 'for', 'of', 'and', 'or', 'with'])
    sentence = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', sentence)
    words = sentence.lower().split()
    words = [word for word in words if word in stopwords and (not any((not char.isalpha() for char in word)))]
    word_counts = Counter(words)
    unique_word_count = len(word_counts)
    return unique_word_count
